I am Sampad and this is where I try to share my activities, discoveries, tutorials and interests. An electrical engineer by education, my interests vary widely, mostly in science and technology, DIY, music.

Intro

By three methods we may learn wisdom: First, by reflection, which is noblest; Second, by imitation, which is easiest; and third by experience, which is the bitterest.   Confucius

Hello, my name is Sampad Bhusan Mohanty. An engineer by education I graduated with a Dual Degree in Electrical from NIT Rourkela , India recently. Currently I am working as a project associate on an Indutrial IoT project under Prof. Rajesh Sundaresan and Prof. Bharadwaj Amrutur at the Robert Bosch Center for Cyber Physical Systems, Indian Institute of Science(IISc), Bangalore, India. Prior to this I was working with Prof. P. Vijay Kumar on a low power device to detect and classify human and animals using multi-array PIR sensors @ ECE IISc.

Say Hi @ smpdmohanty@gmail.com

  • Facebook
  • GitHub

Preformatted

i = 0;

while (!deck.isInOrder()) {
    print 'Iteration ' + i;
    deck.shuffle();
    i++;
}

print 'It took ' + i + ' iterations to sort the deck.';
